Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
Item
Weapon
public class Weapon
extends Item
Weapon of the player

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Weapon​(GameArena panel)
    This constructor creates an item to show weapon.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void setWeapon​(double strength, double angle)
    This method changes the appearance of the weapon.

    Methods inherited from class Item

    getForceR, getHeight, getSource, getSpeedX, getSpeedY, getWidth, getX, getY, setHeight, setSize, setSource, setSpeedX, setSpeedY, setWidth, setX, setY

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon​(GameArena panel)
      This constructor creates an item to show weapon.
      Parameters:
      panel - Display weapon in the panel.

  • Method Details

    • setWeapon

      public void setWeapon​(double strength, double angle)
      This method changes the appearance of the weapon. As the strength and angle change, so does the appearance of the weapon.
      Parameters:
      strength - the greater the strength, the longer the string.
      angle - the bow rotates with the angle
      See Also:
      ImageRotate
